verses.roman:
saptama ślokera artha kari cāri-śloke
yāte nityānanda-tattva jāne sarva-loke

synonyms: saptama ślokera—of the seventh verse; artha—the meaning; kari—I do; cāri-śloke—in four verses; yāte—in which; nityānanda-tattva—the truth of Lord Nityānanda; jāne—one knows; sarva-loke—all over the world.
translation: I have explained this seventh verse in four subsequent verses. By these verses all the world can know the truth about Lord Nityānanda.
